# The `SampleProfileReaderItaniumRemapper` Class Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sampleprof/sampleprofilereaderitaniumremapper">SampleProfileReaderItaniumRemapper</a> remaps the profile data from a sample profile data reader, by applying a provided set of equivalences between components of the symbol names in the profile. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Declaration

<CodeBlock>class llvm::sampleprof::SampleProfileReaderItaniumRemapper</CodeBlock>

## Description {#details}

<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sampleprof/sampleprofilereaderitaniumremapper">SampleProfileReaderItaniumRemapper</a> remaps the profile data from a sample profile data reader, by applying a provided set of equivalences between components of the symbol names in the profile.

Definition at line 265 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/profiledata/sampleprofreader-h">SampleProfReader.h</a>.

## Public Static Functions

### create() {#a2e6e6b82798c515f6161b9d05f404d83}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>ErrorOr&lt; std::unique&#95;ptr&lt; SampleProfileReaderItaniumRemapper &gt; &gt; SampleProfileReaderItaniumRemapper::create (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/stringref">StringRef</a> Filename, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/vfs/filesystem">vfs::FileSystem</a> &amp; FS, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sampleprof/sampleprofilereader">SampleProfileReader</a> &amp; Reader, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/llvmcontext">LLVMContext</a> &amp; C)</>}
  labels = {["static"]}>
Create a remapper from the given remapping file.

Create a sample profile remapper from the given input, to remap the function names in the given profile data.

The remapper will be used for profile read in by Reader.


<ParametersList title="Parameters">
<ParametersListItem name="Filename">The file to open.</ParametersListItem>
<ParametersListItem name="Reader">The profile reader the remapper is going to be applied to.</ParametersListItem>
<ParametersListItem name="C">The LLVM context to use to emit diagnostics.</ParametersListItem>
</ParametersList>

<SectionUser title="Returns">
an error code indicating the status of the created reader.
</SectionUser>

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/profiledata/sampleprofreader-h/#l00277">277</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/profiledata/sampleprofreader-h">SampleProfReader.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/profiledata/sampleprofreader-cpp/#l01925">1925</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/profiledata/sampleprofreader-cpp">SampleProfReader.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### create() {#ab86d93032dfafc59c9fe7abf873d3394}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>ErrorOr&lt; std::unique&#95;ptr&lt; SampleProfileReaderItaniumRemapper &gt; &gt; SampleProfileReaderItaniumRemapper::create (std::unique&#95;ptr&lt; <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/memorybuffer">MemoryBuffer</a> &gt; &amp; B, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sampleprof/sampleprofilereader">SampleProfileReader</a> &amp; Reader, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/llvmcontext">LLVMContext</a> &amp; C)</>}
  labels = {["static"]}>
Create a remapper from the given Buffer.

Create a sample profile remapper from the given input, to remap the function names in the given profile data.

The remapper will be used for profile read in by Reader.


<ParametersList title="Parameters">
<ParametersListItem name="B">The memory buffer to create the reader from (assumes ownership).</ParametersListItem>
<ParametersListItem name="C">The LLVM context to use to emit diagnostics.</ParametersListItem>
<ParametersListItem name="Reader">The profile reader the remapper is going to be applied to.</ParametersListItem>
</ParametersList>

<SectionUser title="Returns">
an error code indicating the status of the created reader.
</SectionUser>

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/profiledata/sampleprofreader-h/#l00283">283</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/profiledata/sampleprofreader-h">SampleProfReader.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/profiledata/sampleprofreader-cpp/#l01946">1946</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/profiledata/sampleprofreader-cpp">SampleProfReader.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>
